alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 12:40PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BALDWIN AND CENTRAL ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1139 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Molino, or 10 miles northwest of Gonzalez, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Barrineau Park and Molino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
